myTunes

myTunes.

Your music, podcasts and audiobooks take center stage.

myTunes is the best way to organize and enjoy the music, podcasts, and audiobooks you already have - and shop for the ones you want. Enjoy all the entertainment myTunes has to offer on your device.

Music

50 million songs. Zero ads.

Stream over 50 million songs, ad-free. Or download albums and tracks to listen to offline. All the music in your personal myTunes library — no matter where it came from — lives right alongside the myTunes Music catalog. Start your free three-month trial with no commitment, and cancel anytime.

Start Your Trial Now

myTunes Music is available for PC, Mac, iOS and Android devices.

Podcast collection you always wished for. Granted.

Discover the world's most powerful podcast player. myTunes has all the podcasts you know & love: over 300k. Find Trending, Most Popular podcasts & more.

Read More

Audiobooks

We've got more than 125,000 incredible audiobooks that will take you anywhere you want to go. We have it all! Bestsellers, classics, award-winners and more. What do you want to listen to? Take your books anywhere with our free apps for iOS and Android. Listening on-the-go has never been faster, easier or more enjoyable.

A world of entertainment. Available wherever you are.

myTunes is available on all your devices, which means you can buy that catchy song you just heard anytime you want. And since your entire library of music, podcasts, and audiobooks lives in the cloud, everything you buy is immediately available, no matter how you want to play it.

Gift Cards

Give friends and family a myTunes Gift Card and they can choose anything from the myTunes, or put in towards myTunes subscription.

Already have a Gift Card?
